original_title: Galle Face attack case: Court revokes travel ban on SDIG Deshabandu
original_body_lines: The Colombo Fort Magistrate's Court today ordered to revoke the overseas travel ban imposed on Western Province Senior DIG Deshabandu Tennakoon in connection with the magisterial inquiry into the Galle Face attack.

The court had earlier issued an order preventing Senior DIG Tennakoon from leaving the country following the mob attack that took place at Temple Trees and Galle Face on May 9, 2022. (Lakmal Sooriyagoda)
